title: Kidnapped
description: Bianca Judd on her way to work finds herself the attraction of a stalker. Aaron Jennings takes obsession to a whole new level. He wants to own Bianca, thus kidnaps her to show her that she will be with only him. Bianca so afraid and so confused needs to appease this madman in order to think of an escape. One that seems to almost impossible This book contains material of sex and submission and some violence. It is recommended for mature audiences.
author: E.L. Beth
